page.title: 02Landscape and Environment
page.content: Flat lowland area below 23 metres with a{rural,urban}and{industrial } {landscape.} Rural area of{intensive arable}and {market-garden}farming.Isolated {Victorian farmhouses}on the mosslands. {Glazebrook}and{Hollins Green}villages now serve mainly a{dormitory}function. Mainly{post-war residential housing} in Cadishead and Partington.Mixture of {private and council estates}associated with the land between the main{'A'} {roads}and the{railways.} {Primary industry}of{clay extraction} and{brickworks}in Rixton.Traditional industries of{tar}and{chemical works} on the banks of the{Manchester Ship {canal.}New{footloose light industry} replacing old traditional industry on these sites.{Dereliction}and {redevelopment}is mainly between the {A57}and the canal.
